settings.title: Full Body Treatment, in Three Steps
A new standard in bodycare
settings.content: What’s considered exceptional for the face, we made foundational for the body.

settings.text: Results from a 35-participant consumer study. Percentages represent self-reported improvement within two weeks by concern.

Cause: Strawberry skin is caused by clogged pores and keratin buildup, leading to small red or dark bumps, typically on the legs and arms.

Solution: This scrub gently resurfaces textured skin, clears buildup, and helps smooth and soften rough patches.

Result: With consistent use, it visibly reduces bumps and reveals clearer, more even-toned skin.
"I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!"

Ingrown hairs form when dead skin builds up and traps the hair beneath the surface, often leading to inflammation, bumps, and post-shave marks. Over time, this can leave behind dark spots and uneven tone. This scrub helps by gently exfoliating the skin’s surface, clearing buildup, and supporting healthy cell turnover. The result is smoother skin, fewer ingrowns, and visibly brighter, more even tone over time.
“Ingrowns on my legs were constant and painful. I started using the serum every other night and the cream in the morning, and within a week the bumps calmed down and the redness faded."

Breakouts and uneven tone are often caused by clogged pores, excess oil, and buildup that disrupts skin clarity. This scrub helps reduce congestion, calm active blemishes, and gently fade dark marks over time—leaving skin visibly clearer, smoother, and more balanced.
"I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!"

"I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!"

Martina, 26: "I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!"

settings.title: Layered formulas
settings.content: Each formula in the Signature Collection is layered with clinically proven, face-grade actives - designed to deliver real transformation.

settings.text: A layered treatment infused with clinical levels of exfoliants, enzymes, and brightening actives — a ritual of renewal usually reserved for the face, reimagined for the body.

settings.title: The art of transformation
settings.content: When your body gets the same treatment as your face, results stop being a maybe.

settings.text: To restore, protect and nurture the skin you have now for lasting results that reveal themselves over time.
Your skin doesn't turn red for no reason. It's telling you it's stressed, sensitive, overwhelmed.
